Her T-shirt had ridden up, exposing her fat lump of belly that was rapidly swelling and approaching roughly the size and shape of a beach ball. Briann could see that, although at her size she needed the feeding tube simply to stay alive, Gwen did not- and that meant she was quite willing to get even bigger. Briann was very pleased.

Gwen, too, was quite happy. The lard, though quite unusual, tasted terrific, and the quantity of it meant that she would soon be just as fat as her significantly larger friend. As she looked down from her perch on Briann's belly at her friend's immense face, ringed by cheeks, chins, and arm, nestled down in the valley between the peaks of belly and butt, she could see just how happy she was. Gwen had long ago weighed, as well as a girl so young could, the consequences of immobility, and she had almost instantly decided that not having to do anything at all was vastly preferable to the alternative. She stroked Briann's enormous belly, and smiled around her tube. Briann returned the gesture.

And so, the two girls ate, and ate, and ate...

Alexis was in heaven. Her little girl, already very fat, had clearly become much fatter- and that was all she had ever wanted for her little big Gwen. But, as the daughter of an actuary and a calculus professor, numbers were at the heart of Alexis' being- so she needed a quantity. She needed to find out just how much more Gwen weighed than she had just a day before. But, seeing as Gwen wasn't exactly in the mood to move very far, they resorted to a bit of old-fashioned ingenuity. Alexis began by waving a very large cookie at Gwen, catching the attention of the smaller fatty. With the smell of the cookie permeating her snubby nose and Alexis's cooing, Gwen began scooching herself over to her mother, dislodging her scraps of clothes still further in the process. Once she reached the edge of Briann's vast body, the two mothers were able to lower her down without too much process. Briann, however, upon realizing that Gwen was gone, threw a tantrum- or as much of a tantrum as an immobile girl can throw (it wasn't much- just a bit of low moaning.) Jule activated the bed scale, revealing that Briann now weighed a whopping 671 pounds- fifty pounds up from this morning! An absolutely astonishing gain by any standards. "Aw, my beautiful big princess! Were you trying to impress Gwen? Well, you impressed me for sure, Bri-Bri!" She patted her daughter's sweaty hair affectionately.

Then, phase two. Gwen was, again without much protest, lifted back onto her perch on the vast swath of fat that was Briann. Then, the scale was activated again. The numbers flashed- 885! After some quick calculations, that brought Gwen up to an absolutely astounding 214 pounds- up from just 164!

Alexis gasped, barely believing the numbers before her. "This is- this is..."

1411112111111122112211211212111211211211.content:
“This… this isn’t enough; she’s much too thin!” Exclaimed Alexis, turning to Jule.


“Would it be alright if I took you up on your offer to stay the night? Leaving Gwen on the feeder, of course, I’d love to see how big she’ll be in the morning.” She explained, almost visibly drooling at the thought of her growing girl getting all the larger.

She’d known, almost immediately after seeing the girl that her daughter was currently sitting on, what she wanted in Gwen’s future, growth, nothing but. Only for her ‘little’ girl to grow, out, and out, and out, larger than even Briann, and with the clinic’s paste’s effects, she’d never have to worry about any unwanted consequences caused by her unnatural size.


Jule readily agreed, sharing Alexis’ enthusiasm in fattening the girls, “Of course, who do you think you’re asking? I’ll even increase the power for good measure.” She said, twisting one of the pump’s many dials, making the flow noticeably quicken.


The girls, being on the receiving end of the feeding, were slightly surprised at the increase in flow, but, being the gluttons they were, they welcomed the change, suckling on their respective hoses. The mothers, strange as they may be, were moving back inside the house for the night, or at least they would be if Alexis could keep her hands off her daughter’s growing body. Currently, she was squishing and massaging all of the newly added flab from today’s feeding, the testament of the girl’s excess, while thinking that it’d take nothing short of a miracle for the growing Gwen to be able to move a single step after tonight.

Though, with the inevitable promise of much more Gwen, there was a question to ask,


“Is it alright to leave her on top of Briann? Maybe we should move Gwen now, given that this is about the last time we’ll be able to.”


Jule hadn't realized this seemingly obvious problem, but luckily, she seemed to have a solution. “Oh, I can’t believe that slipped my mind. Could you come and help me for a moment, there should be an extra bed in storage for when Briann outgrows the one she’s on, let’s put Gwen on it.”

After giving her consent, Alexis went with Jule over to the more cluttered area of the garage, soon finding the aforementioned bed. Given the bed’s size, they thought it’d be more comfortable for both of them to carry it at once, so, each mother grabbing a side, they started lugging it over next to Briann’s bed, making sure it was close enough for Gwen’s tube to reach. Now to move the growing girl, it wasn’t hard, given that they only needed to nudge the smaller girl until she ended up on the other bed slightly disgruntled but ultimately not caring much in the presence of food.

Alexis, now all the more excited for the growth her daughter would experience for now till… well, she supposed it wouldn’t end, not for a good few years at least, spoke out of barely repressed delight and relief,


“I’m glad we moved Gwen now, I doubt we’d have been able to if we’d waited till morning. She’s already so big, how much larger do you think she’ll be in the morning?”


“I’d assume closer to my daughter’s size right now, but we won’t know until tomorrow. Come on. We should probably get some food ourselves, what would you like?” Jule asked, remembering that they hadn’t eaten throughout their conversation.


“Oh, anything’s fine, but now that you mention it, I am hungry. Maybe we should wait till we’ve finished eating to continue our conversation since I’m hoping to eat something before breakfast tomorrow.”


Leaving the girls to feed from their respective hoses, the mothers went back inside to finish their earlier conversation, each having the pleasant thought of how much doughier the girls will be in the morning.

She grabbed a green dress with daisy patterns, it looked large enough. She fed Briann's hands through the holes and gently pulled it down. The dress stopped just below the rolls of fat that would grow to be Briann's breasts.
"okaaay" her mother murmured, she searched the rack for more dresses. She decided upon a yellow sundress two sizes larger. She tired to put that on Briann, but found that only reached a few inches bellow her breasts. She threw it in her basket, deciding to use it as a shirt for Briann.

"Awww Briann!" her mother groaned "You'll have to wait to get home for a change"

She grabbed a larger dress, a red strawberry patterned one. This time it managed to cover her belly button, leaving her fat legs and diaper on show. Satisfied she threw two in the basket. Briann was getting too big even for plus-sized baby clothes. All the sizes she bought were barely crop-tops on her! she'd have to find a source for bigger ones before people started saying her baby was nearly nude!

She turned to leave to nearly knock a girl over.
"Oh No!" she gasped as the girl managed to steady herself along a self, she noticed that the girls belly was swollen into a round pregnant bulge. "Oh my god are you okay?"

"I'm fine, I'm fine" the girl replied, clutching and rubbing her belly. She was a pale girl with dirty blond hair tied in a ponytail behind her. She looked at her than at Briann. "oh my"

"What a lovely girl she was" smiled her mother taking hold of teh stroller and wheeling Briann away. briann nodded, having eaten her chcolate bar already, before soaking her diaper again
